Key Match Events: Mickey Moniak hit a first-inning three-run homer.
Taylor Ward homered in his third straight game.
Niko Kavadas hit his second major league homer.
Ward extended his hitting streak to a career-best and current AL-best 14 games.
Andy Pages drove in an RBI single in the seventh inning.
Ward, Jo Adell, and Zach Neto added RBI singles in the eighth inning.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Angel Stadium was sold out for the second straight night, giving the Halos five sellouts this season.
